column2:
'spark. executor.instances: 2'
'inputs:'
'titanic_data:'
'type: uri_file'
'path:'
'afss://<FILE_SYSTEM_NAME>@<STORAGE_ACCOUNT_NAME>.dfs.core.windows.net/d'
'ata/titanic.csv'
'mode: direct'
'outputs :'
'wrangled_data:'
'type: uri_folder'
'path:'
'afss://<FILE_SYSTEM_NAME>@<STORAGE_ACCOUNT_NAME>.dfs.core.windows.net/d'
'ata/wrangled/'
'mode: direct'
'args: >-'
'-- titanic_data ${{inputs.titanic_data}}'
'- - wrangled_data ${outputs . wrangled_data}'
